title: Nami Fan Art

embed.description: 2015.10.28 my main champion in the Leage of Legends Xd had a blast drawing her for the last couple of days. *I will be uploading the step-by-step wip images and the original psd file to my Pa...

body:
Ok I apparently submitted to the wrong category
and had to re-upload xd
sorry Riot!

--original posting--
I just drew my fan art of Nami but didn't know where to upload lol
I hope this is the right place xd

Nami has always been my main champion~!
I think she's one of the most beautiful looking champs in the game ;)
The splash artist did an awesome job!

It was a lot of fun drawing this fan art for the last couple of days.
I learned a lot :)

replies.body: Wow, this is pretty! I really like the light filtering through the water. It's a cool effect. :)
She looks like a siren, be careful {{champion:41}}
Excellent work. Great lighting, incredible attention to detail, lovely work. (Also, between you and me, Nami is my favorite support. Too much fun.)
Looks great, really like your work :3
